courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Restricted to first-year freshman and transfer students.
description: Grand Challenge Learning course in the Health & Wellness pathway. Introduces students to the fundamentals of life sciences with an emphasis on health & wellness and experiential learning through projects, design-based thinking, community-engaged scholarship, or field trips. Topics vary by section. Prerequisite: Restricted to first-year freshman and transfer students.
label: Health and Wellness in Life Sciences
sectionCappArea: Restricted to First Time Freshman or Transfer student - first time students.
sectionDegreeAttributes: Grand Challenge-Health/Well, and Life Sciences course.
